recipesJson.name: DD Boston Cream Donut
recipesJson.author: Daytimefrank1
recipesJson.description: A simple Boston cream donut. Pretty straight forward. Glazed donut for the donut with Joy to add a fried note. Custard Premium for the center and the combination of double chocolate clear and buttercream frosting for the frosting on top. I love buttercream frosting as a base that you can add different flavors to create different frostings.
